Question
========
  
Which of the following statements is correct, assuming other circumstances remain the same?

I The power of a test changes if the sample size changes. II The power of a test changes if the probability of error of the first kind changes.

  
Answerlist
----------
* Neither proposition is correct.
* Only statement I is correct.
* Only statement II is correct.
* Both statements are correct.

* This answer is incorrect.
